title: Swift 3 - Using Search bar as input to webview
body:
It looks like what you want it:

let url = NSURL(string: "http://(text)")!

to be:

let url = NSURL(string: "http://example.com/\(text)")!

The key differences here is that you weren't getting the value of text, you were adding the String "(text)". Also you weren't including the example.com part.

Additionally, it looks like that function isn't an IBAction so nothing is calling it. Additionally, you aren't using UISearchBarDelegate which could be useful here.
